msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: Both left and right are badly damaged, especially at the top of the right. The right side to top needs to be moved slightly to the left; fibers are frayed at the right hand side. The papyrus was horizontally folded few times, and vertically as well. Kollesis at the middle of col. 157. No restoration is needed. (MA)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive.
